name: Northerner
description:
Northerner is a short story-based game that was created as part of a game jam in a German forum. The jam was about creating a game with a reference to "cold".

Join the northerner on his journey to a new town covered by snow and ice. What will await him there? Which people will he meet? This journey might not be an easy one, but you decide how it ends. Depending on the choices you make, you will reach one of three possible endings.

I'd like to point out that if you suffer from mental illness or usually prefer light-hearted games, this might not be the game you're looking for.

This game can be either played with Controller or Keyboard and supports two languages (German and English).
